attributes.action: stop the police shutting down urban events and clubs through loopholes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition against the Police shutting down a disproportionate amount of black own clubs and Urban themed events through loop holes in how night club incidents and situations are managed.

For Non black clubs if there is a spate of consistent trouble, the police COOPERATE with the clubs and offer their presence to ward off trouble makers. 
BLACK CLUBS ARE DUE THE SAME SUPPORT, not victimisation.

This is evident by actions taken by Brixton Police against Brockwells Wine Bar in south London (Featured in London Lite newspaper, Tues 11th March '08). Weekly occurrences of young HOODED gangs (about 20-30 strong) attempting to storm in without paying or getting searched. The Police were slow to attend, if they did attend.

Then when drastic procedures were put in place by the club and WERE WORKING,
The Police then conducted 'Sting Operations' with the INTENT of finding grounds to shut down the establishment.
Many more clubs have been shut down for no apparent reason…Why?
